definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
close/familiar/intimate/closely (related)/to foster close ties/to pay close attention
to keep sth confidential/to maintain secrecy

sentences.english: Fred is a nark. He squealed.
sentences.chinese: 弗雷德是警方的眼线，是他告的密。

sentences.english: The heart-shaped studs in clear crystal pavé will make your heart melt.
sentences.chinese: 心形透明密镶水晶耳钉足以让你心动。

sentences.english: Let the centers of all the atoms in one close-packed plane be labeled A.
sentences.chinese: 将同一个密堆积平面内所有原子的中心标记为A。

sentences.english: Apparently the unusual, spade-like shape of Ventura's hands was a dead giveaway.
sentences.chinese: 显然，文图拉那不寻常的铲子形手准确地泄了密。

sentences.english: I am sealed in a cottage of glass that is completely airtight .
sentences.chinese: 我被封闭在密不透气的玻璃小屋里。

sentences.english: Inflorescence racemose to 7 cm at fructification , densely yellow pubescent.
sentences.chinese: 总状的花序达7厘米在果期，密被黄色短柔毛。

sentences.english: For over three hundred years the rulers of the Roman Empire worshipped the god Mithras .
sentences.chinese: 三百多年以来，罗马帝国的统治者崇拜密特拉神。

sentences.english: The name Mithras was the Persian word for 'contract'.
sentences.chinese: 密特拉神的名字波斯语叫做“盟约”。

sentences.english: Mark Finney, the fire forecaster, lives in a fire-prone area outside Missoula.
sentences.chinese: 火灾预报员马克芬尼住在密苏拉附近的一个易燃地区。

sentences.english: A friend helped me find my first job as a general labour in City of Mississauga.
sentences.chinese: 经朋友介绍，我在密西沙加市找到了第一份打工。

sentences.english: His mother's name was Meshullemeth daughter of Haruz; she was from Jotbah.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲名叫米舒利密，是约提巴人哈鲁斯的女儿。

sentences.english: Specialized obturator foramen type of Flexible Neoprene.
sentences.chinese: 专用密封闭孔弹性氯丁橡胶。

sentences.english: Cover your skin with tightly woven long-sleeved shirts, long pants and wide-brimmed hats.
sentences.chinese: 穿织的密一些的长袖衬衫，长裤子和宽边帽子。

sentences.english: Urusemal reaffirmed his government's adherence to the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 乌鲁塞马尔总统重申密政府坚定奉行一个中国政策。

sentences.english: They are covered in clear crystal pavé and reflect the light in magical ways.
sentences.chinese: 密镶透明水晶，反射着另人惊艳的光芒。

sentences.english: In the simulations you will be using a modified mil dot reticle .
sentences.chinese: 在模拟器里你会使用到改良的密位点十字线。

definition: to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near
branch/classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc
pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
